mapper.sql: emp_id, emp_name, emp_dept, emp_time, emp_job, emp_dupy
mapper.insert:
insert into t_emp
emp_id,
emp_name,
emp_dept,
emp_time,
emp_job,
emp_dupy,

mapper.update:
update t_emp
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_dept = #{empDept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
emp_time = #{empTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_job = #{empJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_dupy = #{empDupy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_emp set emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_dept = #{empDept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_time = #{empTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_job = #{empJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_dupy = #{empDupy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_emp e left join emp_dept d on e.emp_dept=d.dept_id
